summary: The main character Solo in Nirvana, a computer game developed by Jimi for release in 3 days, has gained self-awareness after a virus attack. Solo wants to be deleted. Jimi wants to find his ex.
cast: Christopher Lambert|Diego Abatantuono|Sergio Rubini|Stefania Rocca|Amanda Sandrelli|Emmanuelle Seigner|Claudio Bisio|Antonio Catania|Gigio Alberti|Ugo Conti|Silvio Orlando|Oreste Guidi|Hal Yamanouchi|Avinash Ganesh|Antonello Grimaldi|Paolo Rossi|Bebo Storti|Fabio Sartor|Corinna Agustoni|Leonardo Gajo|Gianni Palladino|Renato Sarti|Luca Torraca|Riccardo Zinna|Bed Cerchiai|William Chiu|Coco Leonardi|Giuseppe Messina|Suleyman Salmassi|Daniel Auber|Luisa Corna|Alessandro Cremona|Alessandro Eccelsi|Pieter Jurriaanse|Reynold Joh Kerr|Christine Krug|Rosario Marino|Dodo Oltrecolli|Roman Pavlushev|Vincenzo Petrarolo|Elisabetta Riva|Giovanni Sorenti|Marialuisa Tadei|Eugenio Ciotola|Marcello Mazzarella|Michael Oyegunle|Stefania Ventura|Bachir Ahmet Diakhate|Rocco Di Gioia|Lorenzo Loris|Valerio Staffelli|Loredana Zupanic|Aminata Fall|Victor Kanu|Agostino Canepa|Federico Pasquetto|Germaine Damar|Andrea Daz|Ricardo Perna

title: Nirvana
